channel.title: [PI] Magic VS player
channel.description:
Hey guys, When i cast barrage/spell on a player, it splashes, and there is no chance of even hitting the player. this has pissed my hybrids off, and I've spent an hour or so browsing through the CombatAssistant class, couldn't find anything.
EDIT: Found out it must be a attackplayer method, because i'm not hitting, and it isnt displaying a "0" hitsplat.
Help please?

item.title: [PI] Magic VS player
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hey guys,
When i cast barrage/spell on a player, it splashes, and there is no chance of even hitting the player.
this has pissed my hybrids off, and I’ve spent an hour or so browsing through the CombatAssistant class,
couldn’t find anything.

EDIT: Found out it must be a attackplayer method, because i’m not hitting, and it isnt displaying a “0” hitsplat.

Help please?

Read full topic
